channel.title: news on Hinode
channel.description: Recent content in news on Hinode

item.title: Update COVID-19 impact on CEDA and JASMIN operations
item.description: At the beginning of the Covid-19 pandemic, we announced that all of our services should be considered at risk. Thankfully, our services have run largely as normal throughout the pandemic, but 10 months on, unfortunately, this ‘at risk’ status still stands.
